snippet: Ahead of the first meeting of the season between the Yankees and the Red Sox, Boston Manager Bobby Valentine kept his needling of the enemy to a minimum, for now.
abstract: Boston Red Sox and New York Yankees meet in spring training for first time since Red Sox hired manager Bobby Valentine; Red Sox defeat Yankees, 1-0.
lead_paragraph: Ahead of the first meeting of the season between the Yankees and the Red Sox, Boston Manager Bobby Valentine kept his needling of the enemy to a minimum, for now.

headline.seo: Valentine Brings New Face, and Fire, to Yankees-Red Sox Rivalry
headline.main: Rivalry Kicks Off With New Face and Added Fire
headline.print_headline: Rivalry Kicks Off With New Face and Added Fire
